item.title: Gladiator 2's Scrapped Flashback Scene Originally Included Russell Crowe's Return, Reveals Writer
item.description: Gladiator 2 writer Peter Craig reveals that the original draft for the epic sequel nearly had a flashback scene with a Russell Crowe return.

item.title: Dolittle Movie Ending Explained: Why It's So Bad
item.description: Robert Downey Jr.'s Dolittle movie had a whole mess of problems, but few were as glaring or memorably terrible as its messy ending. Here's why.

item.title: Jumanji 3: Release Date, Cast, Story & Everything We Know
item.description: “When does Jumanji 3 come out?” and other such questions can be answered here, with news about the release date and more slowly coming out.
